welcome_message_body: Welcome to Caxias do Sul! Get ready to be charmed by our city's beautiful landscapes, rich cultural heritage, and delicious cuisine. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Caxias do Sul has to offer.

restaurants.name: Hamburgueria Jaime Rocha

restaurants.address: R. Marquês do Herval, 983 (Centro), Caxias do Sul, RS, 95020-262
